newsitem.title: USA: Vistana Inc to acquire Success and Points.
newsitem.headline: Vistana Inc to acquire Success and Points.

text.p: Vistana Inc said on Monday that it had signed a definitive agreement to acquire privately held Success Cos and Points of Colorado, along with some unspecified related firms, for roughly $24.0 million in cash plus 640,000 shares of Vistana common stock.

About 430,000 shares, or 67 percent of the shares, will be awarded to Success and Points contigent upon earnings achievements set for the 1998, 1999 and 2000 calendar years, Vistana said in a statement.

Vistana, a developer of vacation ownership resort properties, said the value of the stock consideration would be about $11.6 million, while the total value of the cash and stock consideration would be about $35.6 million.
Vistana said it expected to close the merger transaction by September 30, 1997, and it would account for the deal as a purchase with goodwill being amortized over 20 years.
Success and Points develops and operates three vacation ownership resorts, one in Arizona and two in Colorado.
